overview_of_class: Graduate colloquium dedicated to the discussion of recent published work in gender and sexuality studies and of graduate student work in progress. This two-course colloquium will meet ten times during fall and spring-quarter, with students receiving credit at the end of spring quarter.
name: Graduate Colloquium
title: WCAS GNDR_ST 401-0-20 Graduate Colloquium
